titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s2: Upside down, seems to be not elated to Leibowitch but general store business All is crossed out

body.ab:
1939 LEIBOWITCH René 14 rue François Guibert 15e
1 m 1 v S 20 dep 50
Dec 15 Absalom Absalom Dec 23 Dec 23 Doctor Martino Dec 29 Dec 29 Wild Palmo Jan 6 (Pylon barg. copy 45v will pay in a few months)
Dec 30 paid 15 45 15 bal due 30 Jan. 15 Jan 6 Sound & the Fury 15 paid Jan 6 15 bal. due paid Jan 15. 1940 Sub. ren. 1m 1v. S. Jan 15. 1940 - Feb 15 1940. 20v
Jan. 15 As I lay dying Jan. 24 Jan 24 These Thirteen put aside) Feb 6 Feb 6 Sartoris Feb 17 Feb 17 paid 40v on a/c for Absalom ordered Reb 8 left deposit will renew later
sent cards to 1938 May 11 MINH Artemus Ward returned May 15 Vinceno Secret War for Oil May 16 Freud & Marx Vox Daphne Adeane Leyris G.M. Hopkins May 30 Denis bill for Great Expectations Paid June 9 May 12 Cros New Bearings in English Poetry {" 17 De Montrichen Gods Little Acre May 18 June 20 " Poems of Day Lewis June 3 Vienne Egoist two vols returned June 7 June 7 Yarrow Collected Papers Freud July 9 Light in August July 9 June 8 Sonnabend Across Spoon River Story of a Novel June 22 Bertrand Fontaine To Wake the Dead June 23 Enchantress nightshade June 25 Ace of Knaves June 23 June 22 J. La Fleur Everywoman July 22 Alexandre Hobbes Leviathan Mettos Jane Austen Jane Austen) July 29 1938 Gillie ALL MEN ARE BROTHERS DUPOY EYELESS IN GAZA GEREBLON Peter the Great Catherine the Great KALBFLEISCH. LORD DUNSANY'S AUTOBIOGRAPHY
